    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert​(Email e)
        Parameters:
        e - - the new Email needs to added This method should add an Email to the PriorityQueue. O(n)

      • updateSpamScore

        public void updateSpamScore​(java.lang.String eID,
                            int score)
        Parameters:
        eID - - the indentifier of the email that needs to update its spam score
        score - - the new score of the email This method should update the spam score of the Email with the given ID. O(logn)

      • getMaximumSpamScore

        public int getMaximumSpamScore()
        Returns:
        - the highest spam score O(1)

      • extractMaximum

        public Email extractMaximum()
        Returns:
        - the Email with the highest spamScore This method should remove the Email from this queue with the highest spam score. O(logn)

      • getIDs

        public java.lang.String[] getIDs()
        Returns:
        - all the Emails' IDs This method returns the identifiers of the Emails stored in this PriorityQueue in any order. O(n)

      • rankEmails

        public java.lang.String[] rankEmails()
        Returns:
        - String array that ranks the Emails from highest spam score to lowest This method returns the unique identifiers and spam scores of the Emails stored in this PriorityQueue sorted from highest to lowest spam score. O(nlogn)

      • getWords

        public java.lang.String[] getWords​(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - - the Email identifier
        Returns:
        - the String array of the content of the provided Email ID This method returns the words of an Email stored in this PriorityQueue with the provided ID. O(n)

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        - the heap size O(1)

      • heapToString

        public java.lang.String[] heapToString()
        Returns:
        - the String array of all email toString O(n)
